Commands.Shadow Stealth: Increases BRV based on Attack then raises it by 1.2 before inflicting an HP attack.  Grants Small Speed Up for 3 turns.  Grants Medium Attack Up for 8 turns.
Commands.Throw: 1-HIT stronger BRV attack.  Ignores Defense.  Lasts for 10 turns after using Wild Throw when target is broken or when it breaks target.

Passives.Spirit of Competition: Grants 100% critical hit rate when BRV equals or exceeds Initial BRV and target's BRV is over twice of that BRV.
Passives.Shadow Stealth Light: Slightly reduces Action Delay after using Shadow Stealth.
Passives.Wild Throw Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Wild Throw.
Passives.BRV Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed when BRV is over 50%.
Passives.Wild Throw Light: Slightly reduces Action Delay after using Wild Throw.
Passives.Shadow Stealth Charge: Increases the max uses of Shadow Stealth by 1.
Passives.Wild Throw Charge: Increases the max uses of Wild Throw by 1.
Passives.Assassination: Grants a low probability of poisoning the target for 3 turns after an HP Attack.
Passives.Shadow Stealth Extend: Moderately raises the BRV Gain based on Attack.Slightly improves Speed Up and extends it by 2 turns.Grants Medium Evasion Rate Up for 5 turns.
Passives.Buff Boost&Speed: Slightly raises Max BRV and Speed while buffed.
Passives.Wild Throw Extend: Increases the number of hits to 6.Moderately raises Wild Throw's potency.Triggers an HP attack after every 3 hits.Moderately raises the potency of Throw (BRV Attack).

Weapons.Fuma Shuriken CP: 15: Increases Shadow Stealth's multiplier to 1.4 and extends the duration of Attack Up.
Weapons.Pinwheel CP: 35: Increases the max uses of Wild Throw by 1.Increases its potency and lowers its Action Delay.Grants Medium Max BRV Up for 10 turns.Turns BRV Attack to Throw for 10 turns when Wild Throw is used while the target is broken or breaks the target.
